function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Collection of information involves interacting with building staff and users, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Unmitigated transmission of contagious diseases among building occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols and remote data collection methods.","Technologies":"Remote data collection technology, contactless sensors, and digital interviews.","People":"Building staff, technical managers, and users.","Owner":"Building management and technical team."},{"Description":"Evaluation and auditing of current BACS involves physical interaction with building systems and devices.","Impact":"Lack of mitigation measures can lead to the spread of diseases through surface contact.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of equipment, use of touchless interfaces, and remote monitoring of systems.","Technologies":"Touchless interfaces, remote monitoring systems, and self-disinfecting surfaces.","People":"Technical managers, maintenance staff, and auditors.","Owner":"Building management and technical team."},{"Description":"Implementation of BACS design and functionalities improvements involves on-site work and potential exposure to contagions.","Impact":"Unmitigated exposure to diseases during the installation and enhancement process.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE), limiting on-site personnel, and regular testing of workers.","Technologies":"Advanced PPE, onsite testing facilities, and remote supervision tools.","People":"Installation and maintenance teams, project managers, and on-site personnel.","Owner":"Building management and technical team."}]}
